landing.name: Zach Stone
landing.phrase: To Cross an Ocean You Must Be Willing to Lose Sight of the Shore.
landing.title: Software Engineer

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a software engineer with professional experience in front-end development. My primary skill set is with React.js, Node.js, TypeScript, REST, and GraphQL.
about.description2: As a self-taught software engineer and Japanese speaker, I commit to my goals and work hard to achieve them. Over the course of my career, I have had the opportunity to work on complex business applications that have been utilized by companies throughout the United States.
about.description3a: I'm currently working as a front-end software engineer at
about.description4: When I am not coding, I enjoy studying Japanese and have passed the JLPT N2 and Kanji Kentei Level 10 exams.
about.description5: You can reach me at Zach.Stone.Developer@gmail.com
